title: Mobile-Based Language Learning Design Microlearning for Adult Preservice Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational language education theories
context.additional_context: Mobile-optimized learning environment to enhance pre-service/in-service teachers' language education competencies

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement 15-minute microlearning activities in mobile environments
Learners can identify and utilize at least three learning-support activity patterns suitable for language education
Learners can revise and improve learning design drafts at least twice through peer assessment
Learners can finalize learning activity scenarios in a form that is at least 80% feasible by incorporating formative assessment feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
